body_html:
I encountered the exact same issue when using massive amount of checkpoint-ing, and to workaround it I increased the max recursion depth like this
sys.setrecursionlimit(3000)
notice that you can see the current recursion limit like this:
sys.getrecursionlimit()
for me it was 1000

note: I don't know why there's a deep recursion in this scenario, as the checkpoint calls are not nested, I assume that it's related to the autograd mechanism that travels on the graph or something of this nature.
